Package com.codename1.rad.text

This package contains text processing utilities such as date formatters and number formatters, which are used by CodeRAD for data conversion of properties.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DateFormatter
    Interface for objects that can format and parse dates.
    DefaultTextFormatter.FormatCallback  
    DefaultTextFormatter.ParseCallback  
    NumberFormatter
    Interface for an object that can format and parse numbers.
    TextFormatter
    Interface for objects that can format text.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllFormatsDateFormatter
    A Date formatter that includes many different date formats.
    CurrencyFormatter
    A number formatter for formatting currency.
    DecimalNumberFormatter
    A formatter for parsing and formatting decimal numbers.
    DefaultTextFormatter  
    IntegerFormatter
    A formatter for parsing and formatting integers.
    LocalDateLongStyleFormatter
    A date formatter that can format dates in the current locale in long format.
    LocalDateShortStyleFormatter
    A date formatter for formatting dates in the current locale in short format.
    LocalDateTimeFormatter
    A formatter for formatting dates as date/time in current locale.
    LocalDateTimeMediumStyleFormatter
    A formatter for formatting dates as date/time in current locale in medium format.
    LocalDateTimeShortStyleFormatter
    A formatter for formatting dates as date/time in current locale in short format.
    TimeAgoDateFormatter
    A date formatter that formats dates like "2 days ago".

Package com.codename1.rad.text Description

This package contains text processing utilities such as date formatters and number formatters, which are used by CodeRAD for data conversion of properties.
